name: (Spanish) Homepage - Currently declared disasters - The declared states on the declared disaster map
id: stories/fullRegression/regressionChecklistSpanish.story;(Spanish) Homepage - Currently declared disasters - The declared states on the declared disaster map

testSteps.description: Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
When I am viewing the declared disaster map
Then states with disasters should be clickable
Then I should be able to view the list of the declared states in Spanish

userStory.narrative:
In order to assert that the basic functionality of https://www.disasterassistance.gov/es/ is working
As a tester
I want to run the daily regressions at least twice a day
